summary.p: Returns the maximum value of the expression in a group. NULL values are ignored.

param.name: value
param.p: An expression to determine the maximum for.

returns.p: The maximum of all evaluated values of expression in a group. NULL values are ignored.

remarks.p: The MAX aggregate function is not limited to certain data types. However, the data type T must be comparable, i.e. implement the .NET interface System.IComparable.
